sentences.sentence: I had spent the last few months boning up on neurology.
sentences.translation: 我前几个月都在钻研神经病学。

sentences.sentence: He visited the Institute of Neurology in Havana where they both worked.
sentences.translation: 他在哈瓦那参观了他们俩都曾工作过的神经病学研究所。

sentences.sentence: He trained in neurology at the National Hospital for Nervous Diseases.
sentences.translation: 他在神经性疾病国立医院里完成了神经学训练。
